=== Dependents/Clients ===

* CI infrastructure.
* SDK IDE.

=== Test Plan ===

Install phablet-tools

With a device connected with a USB cable and developer mode enabled, verify that:
* screenshots still work i.e.; `phablet-screenshot image.png`
* bootcharting is possible i.e.; `phablet-bootchart` 
* configuration toggles can be applied i.e.; `phablet-config` (and all it's options).
* testing is still possible for clicks i.e.; `phablet-click-test-setup` (with and without `--click`)
* test running is still possible for clicks; `phablet-test-run [ap_module]` after `phablet-click-test-setup`
* network provisioning is still possible i.e.; `phablet-network` (and all it's options).
* bootstrapping an android dev environment tree still works i.e.; <nowiki>[[Touch-Porting#Set_up_your_development_environment]]</nowiki>
